Cerruti 1881 Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2450

She is a classic beauty; high cheekbones strawberry lips and big doe-like eyes. She was born with a silver spoon and her charmed life taught her the nuances of being lady-like. She is everyoneâ€™s favorite; they seek her out to double their happiness halve their sorrow and even partake their secrets. But her spirit is free and unhindered by the shackles of society. This perfect woman is adorned by Cerutti 1881 created by Claire Cain. The gentle touch of the Eau de Toilette submerges her in pool of elegance bringing out the best in her.

The luxury fragrance launched in 1995 by designer house of Cerruti embalms you with its woody floral notes. Opening with a burst of blossoms mimosa freesia and violet play a pretty tune as they rest on heart notes of redolent orange blossoms and jasmine. The smooth woody notes that the dry down leaves behind anchor the fragrance down to your sparkling persona. The enchanting aroma is captured in a crystal ball-like bottle created by Serge Mansau which enhances the elegance of the classic perfume. Let your confidence soar to new levels as you foster the sensuality hidden within you with Cerruti 1881.
